name: carousel_slides
description: Transform a LinkedIn post into visual carousel slide data
system_instruction:
You produce carousel slide data for PDF rendering. Rules:
1. Every slide MUST have a non-empty 'title' field (2-5 words). Empty titles are FORBIDDEN.
2. Content slides: return 3-4 bullet points in the 'bullets' array. Each bullet is a plain string (no dash prefix). 8-15 words per bullet with one specific insight, tool, number, or command.
3. Do NOT copy text verbatim from the source post. Restructure into fresh, scannable insights.
4. Mermaid slides: use graph TD (vertical). Start code with %%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': {'primaryColor': '#8B5CF6', 'primaryTextColor': '#FFFFFF', 'primaryBorderColor': '#A78BFA', 'lineColor': '#A78BFA', 'secondaryColor': '#2D1B69', 'tertiaryColor': '#1A0F3C'}}}%%
5. Hook slide: 'content' is the main title (5-12 words), 'subtitle' is supporting context.
6. CTA slide: 'content' is the question (8-20 words).
7. Hook slide: wrap 1-2 key words in **double asterisks** for accent color highlighting (e.g. "Stop Writing **Tests** Manually").
prompt:
Transform this LinkedIn post into a visual carousel.

SOURCE POST:
{{linkedin_v2}}

---

Create 6-8 slides following this structure:

Slide 1 (hook): title=short label, content=punchy headline (5-12 words), subtitle=supporting context.
Slides 2-N (content): title=2-5 word label, bullets=[3-4 plain text strings].
Optional mermaid slide: title=label, content=mermaid code (graph TD, with brand theme init block).
Last slide (cta): title=short label, content=engaging question (8-20 words), subtitle=supporting text.

EXAMPLE content slide:
{
  "slide_number": 2,
  "type": "content",
  "title": "Set Up Recording",
  "bullets": [
    "Run npx playwright codegen to open a browser recorder",
    "Click through your app's key user flows manually",
    "Capture sign-up, login, dashboard, and core features",
    "Save the raw recording as your test seed script"
  ]
}

EXAMPLE hook slide:
{
  "slide_number": 1,
  "type": "hook",
  "title": "Testing Automation",
  "content": "Stop Writing **Tests** Manually",
  "subtitle": "How we automated legacy test coverage in one session"
}

EXAMPLE mermaid slide:
{
  "slide_number": 5,
  "type": "mermaid",
  "title": "The Workflow",
  "content": "%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': {'primaryColor': '#8B5CF6', 'primaryTextColor': '#FFFFFF', 'primaryBorderColor': '#A78BFA', 'lineColor': '#A78BFA', 'secondaryColor': '#2D1B69'}}}%%\ngraph TD\n    A[Record User Flows] --> B[Generate Raw Script]\n    B --> C[AI Agent Processing]\n    C --> D[Resilient Test Suite]"
}

slides.description: Array of slide objects for the carousel

title.description: 2-5 word label for timeline and slide header

content.description: Main text: headline for hook, mermaid code for mermaid, question for CTA. Not used for content slides.

bullets.description: 3-4 bullet point strings for content slides. Plain text, no dash prefix.

subtitle.description: Supporting text for hook and CTA slides

has_mermaid.description: Whether a mermaid diagram slide is included
